GSD.description:
scsi: pm8001: Fix use-after-free for aborted SSP/STP sas_task

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.11 by commit f61f9fccb2cb4bb275674a79d638704db6bc2171. For more details please see the references link.
